title: The Mediterranean diet and periodontitis: A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Yasmina Aalizadeh, Nima Khamisi, Parastoo Asghari, Amirhossein Safari, Mahtab Mottaghi, Mohamad Hosein Taherkhani, Anahita Alemi, Masoume Ghaderi, Mohammad Rahmanian
